website_summaries.verdict: This easily absorbed chromium supplement comes in a lower concentration that’s ideal for those experimenting with finding the right dosage.
pros: Niacin bound for superior bio-availability with a lower risk of side effects
Low dosage works well for those with sensitivities and allows for dosage adjustments
Reliable quality from a reputable brand
Gel caps are easy to swallow
Free of gluten, wheat, and dairy
cons: Low concentration might make it necessary to take more than one capsule a day

customer_reviews.title: Look at the Studies
customer_reviews.text: As with many supplements, one is using double-blind scientific studies to justify their use. This helps to metabolize sugar, something we Americans consume in unhealthy amounts. That said I have maintained my weight for 42 years and have consumed this much of the time. There is no feeling of euphoria or increased energy with consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Herman On the Path

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, well packaged, and as pictured. I’ve taken this for years for lowering LDL and raising HDL. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: crivenbark

customer_reviews.title: noticeable decline in cravings for sugar and sweets
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as I'm on my second bottle now. have seen a noticeable decline in my cravings for sugar and sweets

customer_reviews.title: Great Value apple cider capsules with the Mother!
customer_reviews.text: After reading abut the benefits of Apple Cider vinegar with the Mother for both weight loss and general system detox, and after trying and gagging on the liquid forms... I was very happy to find this product in a capsule form. The reviews were good and the price was reasonable compared to many others. I have been using it for just over a month and am quite satisfied with it's efficacy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Brough my A1c way down.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product plus Ceylon cinnamon twice a day for years. Having been labeled a high pre-diabetic, it has helped bring my A1c down a lot, so no more needle sticking needed and checked only once a year. After seeing reviews, people have to keep in mind it does not work over night. If you develop physical issues (red skin, stomach issues etc.) it can mean allergy (even if never had allergies before) or perhaps a reaction from something else one is taking or a medical problem the product is not compatible with, etc. etc. People need to read up on the dos and don'ts of chromium polynicotinate from experts, not just reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Helps foot pain from Diabetes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product on the recommendation of another Vet who had foot pain due to diabetes. It works - since I have been taking these, I have not had any foot pain - thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Blood Sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I use chromium to help stabilize my blood sugar and find that this product works great. I prefer the polynicotinate form over the more common picolinate as it may be safer (there was some early research showing the possibility of DNA damage with picolinate). It is a combination of chromium with niacin which may help to increase the absorption of the chromium. I would suggest that anyone with diabetes discuss the use of this product with their doctor as a way to help lower their A1C. Edited 9/18/13 to add that I no longer use A1C as a reliable measure of blood sugar response based on the advice of my doctor. My fasting and post prandial numbers are excellent.

During workout I'm working harder, sweating more and burning more calories than when I do not take the Chromium Polynicotinate. There is a difference between Chromium Polynicotinate and Chromium Picolinate which is not good for you. product_meta.title: Solgar – Chromium Polynicotinate 200 mcg, 100 Vegetable Capsules
product_meta.description: Chromium is an essential trace mineral that plays an important role in helping insulin regulate blood glucose. May help maintain healthy blood sugar levels already within a normal range. Chromium is a component of a number of enzymes that release energy from cells and is required for proper receptor functioning necessary for nutrient metabolism. Niacin-bound, biologically active chromium.
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL TRACE MINERAL: Chromium is an essential trace mineral which plays a very important role in helping insulin to regulate blood glucose. Along with a nutritious diet, Chromium can help maintain healthy blood sugar levels already within a normal range

ADDED SUPPORT: In addition to supporting healthy blood sugar metabolism, chromium is a component of many enzymes that release energy from cells and is required for proper receptor function that is necessary for nutrient metabolism
NIACIN BOUND: This formulation contains niacin-bound chromium

KOSHER, GLUTEN FREE & SUITABLE FOR VEGANS: These vegetable capsules are KOF-K Kosher certified, are non-GMO and are certified gluten free. They are free of: gluten, wheat, dairy, yeast, sugar, and sodium. They are also free of artificial flavors, sweeteners, and preservatives
